com.sap.conn.idoc

Interface IDocRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface IDocRepository
extends Serializable
    Repository interface providing IDoc meta information. This includes meta information about segment hierarchies and records. The implementing class should use a caching mechanism for best performance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the repository removing all meta data from the local cache.
      String[][] getCachedIDocTypes()
      Returns a two dimensional array of all IDoc types, extensions and releases for which the segment meta data is currently stored in the local cache.
      String getIDocCompoundType(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension)
      Returns the IDoc compound type for the specified IDoc type and extension.
      IDocRepositoryMonitor getMonitor()
      Returns a monitor object for this IDoc repository instance.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the repository.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getRootSegmentMetaData(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Returns the root segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, and release.
      IDocSegmentMetaData getSegmentMetaData(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Returns the segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (segment name).
      IDocSegmentMetaData removeRootSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Removes the root segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData removeRootSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Removes the root segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache.
      boolean removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Removes the specified segment meta data object from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Removes the segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache.
      boolean removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Removes the specified segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Removes the segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the repository removing all meta data from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.

      • getCachedIDocTypes

        String[][] getCachedIDocTypes()
        Returns a two dimensional array of all IDoc types, extensions and releases for which the segment meta data is currently stored in the local cache. The first dimension indicates the number of cache entries, the second dimension has a length of 4 and contains the following values:
            String[0..n][0] : IDoc type
    String[0..n][1] : IDoc type extension
    String[0..n][2] : SAP system release
    String[0..n][3] : SAP application release

        Implementations that do not use a cache just return an empty String array (return new String[0][4];).

        Returns:
        an array of all IDoc types, extensions and releases which the associated segment meta data is currently stored in the local cache.

      • getIDocCompoundType

        String getIDocCompoundType(String iDocType,
                           String iDocTypeExtension)
        Returns the IDoc compound type for the specified IDoc type and extension.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        Returns:
        the IDoc compound type or null if it is not available.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the repository.
        Returns:
        the name of the repository.

      • getRootSegmentMetaData

        IDocSegmentMetaData getRootSegmentMetaData(String iDocType,
                                           String iDocTypeExtension,
                                           String systemRelease,
                                           String applicationRelease)
        Returns the root segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, and release.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        Returns:
        the root segment meta data or null if not available.

      • getSegmentMetaData

        IDocSegmentMetaData getSegmentMetaData(String iDocType,
                                       String iDocTypeExtension,
                                       String systemRelease,
                                       String applicationRelease,
                                       String definition)
        Returns the segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (segment name).
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        definition - segment definition (segment name).
        Returns:
        the segment meta data or null if not available.

      • removeRootSegmentMetaDataFromCache

        IDocSegmentMetaData removeRootSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType,
                                                       String iDocTypeExtension,
                                                       String systemRelease,
                                                       String applicationRelease)
        Removes the root segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        Returns:
        the removed root segment meta data object or null, if the local cache did not contain such an object.

      • removeRootSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache

        IDocSegmentMetaData removeRootSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType,
                                                           String iDocTypeExtension,
                                                           String systemRelease,
                                                           String applicationRelease)
        Removes the root segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        Returns:
        the removed root segment meta data object or null, if the local cache did not contain such an object.

      • removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache

        IDocSegmentMetaData removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType,
                                                   String iDocTypeExtension,
                                                   String systemRelease,
                                                   String applicationRelease,
                                                   String definition)
        Removes the segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        definition - segment definition (segment name).
        Returns:
        the removed segment meta data object or null, if the local cache did not contain such an object.

      • removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache

        boolean removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
        Removes the specified segment meta data object from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        segmentMetaData - the segment meta data object to be removed from the local cache.
        Returns:
        true if the specified segment meta data object was found and removed from the local cache, false otherwise.

      • removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache

        IDocSegmentMetaData removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType,
                                                       String iDocTypeExtension,
                                                       String systemRelease,
                                                       String applicationRelease,
                                                       String definition)
        Removes the segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        iDocType - the IDoc type.
        iDocTypeExtension - the IDoc type extension (CIM type / customer extension type).
        systemRelease - the SAP system release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        applicationRelease - the SAP application release that the IDoc will be sent to.
        definition - segment definition (segment name).
        Returns:
        the removed segment meta data object or null, if the local cache did not contain such an object.

      • removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache

        boolean removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
        Removes the specified segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects from the local cache. Implementations that do not use a cache just provide an empty method.
        Parameters:
        segmentMetaData - the parent segment meta data object to be removed from the local cache.
        Returns:
        true if the specified segment meta data object was found and removed from the local cache, false otherwise.

      • getMonitor

        IDocRepositoryMonitor getMonitor()
        Returns a monitor object for this IDoc repository instance.
        Returns:
        the monitor object.
        Since:
        IDocLibrary 3.0.7
